data.oai_dc:dc: Table 1 & 2: Phenotypic and genetic correlations of herbivore guild and species responses

This R script reproduces the results reported in Table 1 & 2 of the manuscript entitled, "Multiple plant traits shape the genetic basis of herbivore community assembly. Specifically, this script calculates Pearson correlations for phenotypic and genotypic correlations of herbivore community.
